data.name: Silicon Saxony Day
data.description: The 15th Silicon Saxony Day takes place at the BallsportArena Dresden on May 27, 2020. The biggest high-tech event in Saxony offers unique insight into future technologies and business solutions covering hardware, software and connectivity topics.
